definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "pin"), an ancient Korean writing system
a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children

sentences.english: The pro rowers from Bristol usually row in a mixed four team.
sentences.chinese: 来自亲赛艇运动员布里斯托尔通常排在混合四队。

sentences.english: His father has stopped working now, and leads a very easy life.
sentences.chinese: 亲现在已经不再工作，过着很安适的生活。

sentences.english: As she kissed me, her lips felt like ice. 'Come and see me, Ellen;
sentences.chinese: 当她亲我时，她的嘴唇像冰似的。

sentences.english: He has spoken out strongly against an election won by Taiwan's pro-independence party.
sentences.chinese: 他曾强烈抗议台湾赢得选举的亲独立政党。

sentences.english: Today, I lost a bet with my brother and had to kiss his butt.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我和我弟弟打赌输了，我得去亲他的屁股。

sentences.english: The rare view of Cozy-east nursery garden can provide you funs about nature.
sentences.chinese: 这里难得的生态景观，将提供您亲大自然的乐趣。

sentences.english: Pour the champagne, dear Scorpio - you will certainly deserve to mark the moment!
sentences.chinese: 倒一杯香槟，亲的天蝎座，非常值得去记下这一刻。

sentences.english: Most of the experiences that lead to increases in emotional intimacy produce this kind of dynamic.
sentences.chinese: 大多数导致情感亲密度增加的经历都富有生气。

sentences.english: In foreign policy, they tend to be pro-Russian.
sentences.chinese: 在外交政策方面，他们往往是亲俄罗斯的。

sentences.english: Go for it!' I kissed him on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 我于是就在他的脸上亲了一下。

sentences.english: What about the people you leave behind?
sentences.chinese: 你留下的亲人们会如何？

sentences.english: I saw you smooching with that girl just outside my window。
sentences.chinese: 我看到你在我家窗外亲那个女孩了。

sentences.english: At this time of sorrow, deep sympathy goes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 在这悲戚的时刻，谨向和的亲致以深切的慰问。

sentences.english: Therevolutionary change Deng unleashed at home required a pragmatic pro-Westernforeign policy.
sentences.chinese: 邓在国内发起的变革需要采取务实的亲西方外交政策。

sentences.english: The exchange has been seized on by pro-regime media as a demonstration of the leader's tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 这次交流被亲当局媒体视为领导人宽容的表现。

sentences.english: I saw you smooching that girl just outside my window .
sentences.chinese: 我看到你在我的窗外亲那个女孩。

definition: courting/meeting for purpose of marriage/to settle into a relationship
parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law/relatives by marriage
to hold/to carry (in one's arms)/to hug/to embrace/to surround/to cherish
daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line
